title: Did KellyAnne Conway Say Being Labeled Racist is ‘a Small Price to Pay’ for Making America Great Again?
subtitle: A purported quote from a White House senior adviser came from a web site that blends factual stories with satire, and is a hoax.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: KellyAnne Conway said that being labelled racist is a small price to pay for making the country "great again."
